Description: Cozy & comfortable, light-filled one bed, one bath unit at the exclusive Lincolnshire. Great layout for a one bed, city views, elevator, and fabulous roof deck in the concierge Beacon Hill building. Open layout to living room & kitchen, many windows overlooking the city & Charles River views. Kitchen with granite countertops & dishwasher. On site laundry. Bike storage. Furnished option: sofa, loveseat & bar stools can be included for the same price of $3275. Exercise machine could be included as well. Contact me today for a showing! Best location in Beacon Hill!!
